MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY8 postcode area of Leven affecting properties in Main Street. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.55pm to safely make repairs to a faulty section of underground cable outside 108 Main Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.29pm on Thursday 1st April 2021.
